languages.text: По легенде, династия Винтерскейл владеет секретом газовых факторий — цехов, в которых тонны органического сырья проходят через бродильные чаны, термовалики и гермовытяжки для получения ценных химических веществ. С этой священной технологией Янус смог бы производить огромные объемы прометия. Но выкрасть такое сокровище по силам лишь самым умелым и высокооплачиваемым контрабандистам.

traits.locale_text: Украсть у династии Винтерскейл технологический секрет газовых факторий (биогазовых заводов).

languages.text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.
languages.original_text: По легенде, династия Винтерскейл владеет секретом газовых факторий — цехов, в которых тонны органического сырья проходят через бродильные чаны, термовалики и гермовытяжки для получения ценных химических веществ. С этой священной технологией Янус смог бы производить огромные объемы прометия. Но выкрасть такое сокровище по силам лишь самым умелым и высокооплачиваемым контрабандистам.

This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

languages.text: La leyenda dice que la casa Winterscale posee los secretos de los factoriums de gas, talleres donde toneladas de materia prima orgánica atraviesa cubas de fermentación, apisonadoras y sistemas de presión para producir productos químicos valiosos. Esta tecnología sagrada podría permitir que Janus produzca cantidades ingentes de prometio. Sin embargo, solo los contrabandistas más expertos y costosos podrán robar semejante tesoro.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

traits.locale_text: La leyenda dice que la casa Winterscale posee los secretos de los factoriums de gas, talleres donde toneladas de materia prima orgánica atraviesa cubas de fermentación, apisonadoras y sistemas de presión para producir productos químicos valiosos. Esta tecnología sagrada podría permitir que Janus produzca cantidades ingentes de prometio. Sin embargo, solo los contrabandistas más expertos y costosos podrán robar semejante tesoro.

languages.text: La légende raconte que la maison Winterscale détient les secrets des factoriums gaziers, des ateliers dans lesquels des tonnes de matières premières organiques passent par une succession de cuves de fermentation, de rouleaux thermiques et de pulvérisateurs afin d'être transformées en produits chimiques précieux. Cette technologie sacrée pourrait permettre à Janus de fabriquer d'énormes quantités de prométhium. Cependant, seuls les meilleurs contrebandiers, qui sont aussi les plus coûteux, seraient en mesure de s'emparer d'un tel trésor.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

traits.locale_text: La légende raconte que la maison Winterscale détient les secrets des factoriums gaziers, des ateliers dans lesquels des tonnes de matières premières organiques passent par une succession de cuves de fermentation, de rouleaux thermiques et de pulvérisateurs afin d’être transformées en produits chimiques précieux. Cette technologie sacrée pourrait permettre à Janus de fabriquer d'énormes quantités de prométhium. Cependant, seuls les meilleurs contrebandiers, qui sont aussi les plus coûteux, seraient en mesure de s'emparer d'un tel trésor.

languages.text: 据传言称，温特斯凯尔家族掌握着气体馏分的秘密。在馏分作坊里，成吨的有机原料通过发酵池、热滚筒和高压排气装置，转化为价值连城的化学物质。只要得到这项神圣的技术，加努斯便可以源源不断地生产大量钷素。然而，只有技术最硬、开价最高的走私贩子，才敢接下窃取这桩秘密的任务。
languages.original_text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

traits.locale_text: 据传言称，温特斯凯尔家族掌握着气体馏分的秘密。在馏分作坊里，成吨的有机原料通过发酵池、热滚筒和高压排气装置，转化为价值连城的化学物质。只要得到这项神圣的技术，加努斯便可以源源不断地生产大量钷素。然而，只有技术最硬、开价最高的走私贩子，才敢接下窃取这桩秘密的任务。

languages.text: 伝説によると、ウィンタースケール家は。何トンもの有機原料が発酵槽、高温のローラー、高圧排気装置を通過し、貴重な化学物質を生み出す作業場である、ガス・ファクトリアムの秘密を握っているという。この神聖な技術によって、ヤヌスは膨大な量のプロメチウムを生産することができるのだ。しかし、この宝を盗むことができるのは、最も熟練した密輸業者だけだろう。
languages.original_text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

traits.locale_text: 伝説によると、ウィンタースケール家は。何トンもの有機原料が発酵槽、高温のローラー、高圧排気装置を通過し、貴重な化学物質を生み出す作業場である、ガス・ファクトリアムの秘密を握っているという。この神聖な技術によって、ヤヌスは膨大な量のプロメチウムを生産することができるのだ。しかし、この宝を盗むことができるのは、最も熟練した密輸業者だけだろう。

languages.text: Der Legende zufolge kennt das Haus Winterzunder die Geheimnisse von Gasfactorien — Werkstätten, in denen tonnenweise organisches Rohmaterial in Fermentationsfässern, Heißpressen und Druckrohren zu wertvollen Chemikalien verarbeitet wird. Diese heilige Technologie könnte es Janus ermöglichen, gewaltige Mengen an Promethium zu produzieren. Aber nur die fähigsten und am besten bezahlten Schmuggler sind der Aufgabe gewachsen, diesen Schatz zu stehlen.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.

traits.locale_text: Der Legende zufolge kennt das Haus Winterzunder die Geheimnisse von Gasfactorien — Werkstätten, in denen tonnenweise organisches Rohmaterial in Fermentationsfässern, Heißpressen und Druckrohren zu wertvollen Chemikalien verarbeitet wird. Diese heilige Technologie könnte es Janus ermöglichen, gewaltige Mengen an Promethium zu produzieren. Aber nur die fähigsten und am besten bezahlten Schmuggler sind der Aufgabe gewachsen, diesen Schatz zu stehlen.

languages.text: Rivayete göre Winterscale Hanesi, elinde gaz fabrikalarına dair sırlar tutmakta. Aslı varsa bu atölyelerde tonlarca organik ham madde varillerden, sıcak haddeleme makinelerinden ve basınçlı bacalardan geçerek değerli kimyasallara dönüşüyor. Bu kutsal teknoloji, Janus'un müthiş miktarda prometyum üretmesini sağlayabilir. Ancak bu hazineyi sadece en becerikli ve en yüksek ücreti talep eden kaçakçılar çalabilir.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that House Winterscale holds the secrets of gas factoriums, workshops in which tons of organic raw materials pass through fermentation vats, hot rollers, and pressure exhausts to yield valuable chemicals. This sacred technology could enable Janus to produce enormous volumes of promethium. However, only the most skilful and highest-paid smugglers will be up to the task of stealing this treasure.
